title: How should soft governance participation be rewarded?
body:
Seeing as voting using the MANTRA DAO snapshot page is gasless, and doesn't cost anything more than a bit of time, the Council proposes that moving forward only those who participated and voted in the proposal receive the rewards from a given snapshot airdrop proposal. 

For example, in the last proposal where the community voted to have 50,000 $POLS airdropped to stakers, only those who voted would have been eligible for the airdrop.

🕉🕉🕉
choices: Moving forward, change to airdrops getting delivered only to those who voted in each particular proposal.
No change. Airdrops get distributed to every OM staker, whether they participated on a particular proposal or not.
author: 0x377847cE1766edf877De271dD0c61332c723f6b3
